name: Chinese Pickled Cucumbers
author: BaykerGirl
summary: This is my mom's recipe for delicious, easy-to-make pickles that are sweet and sour! They're not conventional pickles, but taste like them. Use any substitute like sliced carrots, (daikon) radish, or even fruit!
ingredients: 1 large English cucumber, cut into 1/4 inch slices
directions: Place cucumber slices into a colander in the sink and lightly sprinkle with salt, tossing to coat
Allow cucumber to drain for 30 minutes
Gently shake the colander to remove any excess liquid and transfer cucumber to a large bowl
Stir in rice vinegar and honey, making sure to coat each cucumber slice evenly
Toss cucumber and return to the refrigerator for an additional hour
